In 1858, Lyell and Hooker together presented the work

of Darwin and Wallace

to the Linnean Society.

It turns out

that life forms are

not unchanging beings,

as we have thought

until now.

The variation of species for the purpose of natural selection…

Strange, contrary to our expectations, people don’t seem very interested.

If Charles hears about this, he’ll be devastated.

The theory

of natural selection

was received positively.

Now that the contents of

the theory are known,

I suggest you finish your

thesis without delay.

165
